summary:
Liga MX is Mexico's top soccer league, featuring 18 teams. It's split into two tournaments: "Apertura" (July-December) and "Clausura" (January-May). Champions are decided through playoffs. Currently, promotion and relegation are on hold until 2026.

It's the best league in CONCACAF and one of the world's most-attended, with huge crowds and high TV ratings in the U.S. Club Am√©rica is the most successful team with 15 titles.
title: Liga MX
